text: rabana la tajealna fitnatan liladhin kafaruu bedhabk lana 'aw tslt alkafirin ealayna fyftnwna ean dynna, 'aw yazharuu ealayna fyuftnu bdhlk, wyqwlu: law kan hwla' ealaa hq, ma 'asabahum hdha aledhab, fyzdadu kfrana, wastr ealayna dhunubana befwk eanha rbna, 'iinak 'ant aleaziz aldhy la yghalab, alhakim fi aqwalh wafealh
